# AIStatusDashboard

## Overview
AIStatusDashboard provides public status, incident, and metrics data for AI providers.

## Tools / MCP
- MCP endpoint: https://aistatusdashboard.com/mcp
- Install from GitHub: https://github.com/khalidsaidi/aistatusdashboard
- MCP Registry: https://registry.modelcontextprotocol.io/v0.1/servers/io.github.khalidsaidi%2Faistatusdashboard/versions/latest
- Quickstart: https://aistatusdashboard.com/docs/agent/mcp-quickstart

## Public APIs
- OpenAPI: https://aistatusdashboard.com/openapi.json
- Well-known OpenAPI: https://aistatusdashboard.com/.well-known/openapi.json
- AI Plugin: https://aistatusdashboard.com/.well-known/ai-plugin.json

## Docs
- MCP quickstart: https://aistatusdashboard.com/docs/agent/mcp-quickstart
- MCP tools: https://aistatusdashboard.com/docs/agent/mcp-tools
- Datasets: https://aistatusdashboard.com/datasets
